import classnames from "classnames"; const Step = ({number, name, icon, active, completed, lastStep}) => { const unstarted = !active && !completed const nameStyle = classnames('ml-4 text-sm', { 'text-gray-200': completed, 'font-medium': completed, 'text-gray-400': unstarted, 'font-medium': unstarted, 'font-bold': active, 'text-gray-50': active, }) const circleStyle = classnames('flex flex-shrink-0 w-10 h-10 flex items-center justify-center border-2 rounded-full', { 'border-indigo-600': completed, 'border-gray-50': active, 'bg-indigo-600': active, 'border-gray-400': unstarted, }) const stepNumberStyle= classnames('text-sm font-medium', { 'text-gray-200': completed, 'text-gray-400': unstarted, 'text-gray-50': active, }) return (
  • {/* */} {completed ? ( ) : ( {number} )} {name} {lastStep && (
